name: Mediterranean-Style Stuffed Peppers
author: gpg
summary: This dish stuffed pepper dish uses fresh herbs, garden bell peppers, and fresh cod combined with Greek olives, Feta cheese, and red onions. It is bursting with fresh flavors!
ingredients: 1 (1 pound) fillet cod, cut into 1/2-inch cubes
1 small zucchini, cut in quarters lengthwise and then crosswise into thin slices
salt and ground black pepper to taste
4 medium bell peppers, tops cut off and seeded
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Cut one lemon half into 1/4-inch thick slices; remove any rind and quarter each slice
Combine cod, feta cheese, diced bell pepper, zucchini, onion, Kalamata and green olives, and lemon slices in a mixing bowl
Mix in oregano and season with salt and pepper
Add lemon juice and olive oil; toss gently to coat all ingredients
Stuff peppers with the cod mixture
Wrap all peppers together in heavy-duty aluminum foil, creating a sealed pouch
Bake in the oven until peppers are tender and cod is cooked through, about 45 minutes
Remove from the oven and let sit for 5 minutes before serving
